<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Laptop Request">0206a04ec3ca22106a8050e1b401312f</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onLoadScreen</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(top.window.location.search);
    var sysId = urlParams.get('req_item_id');

    if (sysId) {
		alert('aaaaaaa');
        var ga = new GlideAjax('GetValueUtils');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPreviousValues');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_sysId', sysId);
		alert('bbbbbbbbb');
        ga.getXMLAnswer(getdata);

    }

	function getdata(response) {
	var answer =JSON.parse(response);
	alert(response);
	g_form.setValue('choose_a_laptop_type', answer.question1);
	g_form.setValue('who_need_It', answer.question2);
	g_form.setValue('input_your_requirements', answer.question3);
}
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-12 01:35:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38c97ac2c3c662106a8050e1b4013149</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onLoadScreen</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Laptop Request" source="x_1755675_laptop_0">337ada5547c22e108762a22f316d43a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Laptop Request">337ada5547c22e108762a22f316d43a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_38c97ac2c3c662106a8050e1b4013149</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-12 05:28:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
